attributes.action: Stop Sotheby's auction of Sikh Guru Gobind Singh Ji's armour on 9th April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The armour plate should first be authenticated as belonging to the Sikh Guru. If proven to be so, the armour plate should be handed back to the Indian government.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
